pullRequest.title: Update requirements concept to support basic verification
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changed requirements trace link to be part of verification. The concept now contains basic elements for generic and domain-specific requirements verification. Other concepts can extend the generic verification interface to create domain-specific requirements validation.
Updates exisiting customized editors to new concept elements...
Otherwise only concept and generated file changes.

commit.message: Add concept basics for requirements verification - (Task #783)
Update existing editors to new requirements concept - (Task #783)
Add icons for requirements verification elements - (Task #783)
Add null check to migration of concepts - (Task #783)

nodes.bodyText: The 2 probably could use a constant rather than just the comment.

There seems to be quite a bit of if branching going on in this method.
Could we maybe move this if block into the above if?
Then we could also move the caType declaration inside and could drop the caType != null in the if.
